STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Get all your essentials in one place, delivered right to your doorstep
FEATURE_1_BODY: Create and manage your daily shopping lists with ease. Never forget an essential item again.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Keep track of your household essentials automatically. Get notified when it's time to restock.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Quickly reorder your favorite daily essentials with just one tap. Save time and effort.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Discover new products tailored to your preferences and usage patterns. Enhance your daily routine.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Compare prices and find the best deals on your essential items. Save money without compromising quality.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Set up recurring deliveries for your most-used items. Ensure you never run out of daily necessities.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about your daily essentials app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is the daily essentials app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our daily essentials app is a convenient platform designed to help you manage and order your everyday necessities with ease. It offers a wide range of products from groceries to personal care items, all in one place.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How do I place an order?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Placing an order is simple! Just browse our catalog, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You can choose your preferred delivery time and payment method before confirming your order.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We offer flexible delivery options including same-day delivery, next-day delivery, and scheduled deliveries. You can choose the option that best suits your needs during checkout.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I save my favorite items for future orders?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely! You can create a list of favorite items or save your frequently ordered products for quick and easy reordering in the future.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How can I contact customer support?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Our customer support team is available 24/7. You can reach us through the in-app chat feature, email, or phone. We're always here to assist you with any questions or concerns.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is the Daily Essentials app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: The Daily Essentials app is a convenient platform designed to help you manage and order your everyday necessities with ease. It streamlines the process of keeping your home stocked with all the items you use regularly.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app allows you to create personalized lists of your daily essentials, set up automatic reordering schedules, and have items delivered directly to your doorstep. You can also track your usage, receive reminders, and adjust your orders as needed.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What types of products are available?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We offer a wide range of daily essentials including groceries, household cleaning supplies, personal care items, pet supplies, and more. Our catalog is constantly expanding to meet our users' needs.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: The basic version of our app is free to use. We also offer a premium subscription with additional features such as priority delivery, exclusive discounts, and advanced inventory management tools. You only pay for the products you order.
